summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Utility Local Improvement District No. 6725; approving and confirming the assessments and assessment roll of that District for the improvement of 9th Avenue from Alder Street to Jefferson Street, from James Street to Seneca Street, and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and the necessary appurtenances; and levying and assessing the amounts of the assessment roll upon the property within the District.
